product_name: Kuhl Kastra Kord Pants - Women's 30" Inseam - 2013 Closeout
long_description: When the fall chill sets in, you'll love the fit, comfort and warmth provided by the women's 30 in. Kuhl Kastra Kord Pants. Soft cotton corduroy has just enough stretch to make the fit feel perfect; full-length side panels provide a 3D fit. Engineered waistband is wide and curved with a high back rise for ultimate fit and comfort. Kuhl Kastra Kord Pants have front hand pockets and 2 back pockets with zip closures. Zip fly with button closure. Closeout.
short_description: When the fall chill sets in, you'll love the fit, comfort and warmth provided by the women's 30 in. Kuhl Kastra Kord Pants.
